analysis.description:
ACAToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/45/0x5846282f218a96ea184be5a67b098d652c411fc1.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(owner,_amount) (/unique_chucks/45/0x5846282f218a96ea184be5a67b098d652c411fc1.sol)
